MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Like Gabriel mention, Singaporeans are not affected by capital gain tax but affected by 30% withholding dividend tax. If you want to trade US stocks, it is better to look at overseas brokers like TD ameritrade, Charles schwab and so on as they usually have better commissions compared to local brokers but you have to double check.3 comments0
